includedAssets.title: Episode 1
includedAssets.synopsis: Arnott and Fleming are tasked with interrogating the sole survivor when a police convoy is brutally ambushed.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Arnott and Fleming are tasked with interrogating the sole survivor when a police convoy is brutally ambushed.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Arnott and Fleming are tasked with interrogating the sole survivor when a police convoy is brutally ambushed.

includedAssets.title: Episode 2
includedAssets.synopsis: Fleming attempts to build some trust with Denton, but finds her to be a tougher subject than she had anticipated.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Fleming attempts to build some trust with Denton, but finds her to be a tougher subject than she had anticipated.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Fleming attempts to build some trust with Denton, but finds her to be a tougher subject than she had anticipated.

includedAssets.title: Episode 3
includedAssets.synopsis: Now in custody, Denton finds herself under intense scrutiny from all sides. Meanwhile, the dead witness's identity is revealed.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Now in custody, Denton finds herself under intense scrutiny from all sides. Meanwhile, the dead witness's identity is revealed.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Now in custody, Denton finds herself under intense scrutiny from all sides. Meanwhile, the dead witness's identity is revealed.

includedAssets.title: Episode 4
includedAssets.synopsis: Arnott and Fleming attempt to identify 'The Caddy', while Denton is granted special dispensation to visit her mother.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Arnott and Fleming attempt to identify 'The Caddy', while Denton is granted special dispensation to visit her mother.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Arnott and Fleming attempt to identify 'The Caddy', while Denton is granted special dispensation to visit her mother.

includedAssets.title: Episode 5
includedAssets.synopsis: As Cottan attempts to cover his tracks, Denton desperately fights for her life and the evidence against Dryden mounts.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As Cottan attempts to cover his tracks, Denton desperately fights for her life and the evidence against Dryden mounts.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As Cottan attempts to cover his tracks, Denton desperately fights for her life and the evidence against Dryden mounts.

includedAssets.title: Episode 6
includedAssets.synopsis: As the investigation comes to a head, the extent of the conspiracy within the force begins to come to light. Series finale.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As the investigation comes to a head, the extent of the conspiracy within the force begins to come to light. Series finale.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As the investigation comes to a head, the extent of the conspiracy within the force begins to come to light. Series finale.

includedAssets.title: Season 2
includedAssets.synopsis: When an attack on a police convoy leaves only one survivor, Arnott and Fleming investigate the possibility of an inside job. Second series of the intense crime drama.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: When an attack on a police convoy leaves one survivor, AC-12 investigate the possibility of an inside job. Second series of the intense crime drama.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: When an attack on a police convoy leaves only one survivor, Arnott and Fleming investigate the possibility of an inside job. Second series of the intense crime drama.

includedIn.title: Line Of Duty
includedIn.shortSynopsis: After being reassigned to internal affairs, DS Steve Arnott attempts to find the truth in a police force crippled by corruption.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: After being reassigned to internal affairs, DS Steve Arnott attempts to find the truth in a police force crippled by corruption.
